scripts.eslint:check: cd server && yarn eslint:check && cd ../client && yarn eslint:check
scripts.eslint:fix: cd server && yarn eslint:fix && cd ../client && yarn eslint:fix
scripts.prettier:check: cd server && yarn prettier:check && cd ../client && yarn prettier:check
scripts.prettier:fix: cd server && yarn prettier:fix && cd ../client && yarn prettier:fix
scripts.install:all: yarn install && cd server && yarn install && cd ../client && yarn install
scripts.start:local: concurrently "cd client && yarn start" "cd server && yarn start"
